message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable selling it to you for $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I'm willing to make a slight concession, Bob, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my target. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
